posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: 欢迎来到我的个人空间，第一次搭建个人博客以方便今后总结和分享学到的知识。 Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
